channel.title: How do i make levels heigher?
channel.description: i have drag-pkz what do i do to make so players can get heigher levels like level 200 attack ect....

item.title: How do i make levels heigher?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

r8edhardknock03:

what folder is it in tho?

Sorry, I didn’t explain well enough. It’s in your client class.

item.source: How do i make levels heigher?

item.title: How do i make levels heigher?
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:2, topic:262209”]Search this -

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

You should see this -

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl;
Make it this -

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 200; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl;[/quote]

That would be in the client.java. Search for what he said and replace what is there with what he said.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make levels heigher?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

anc13ntpk3r:

JC do you have a 508?

I started coding one, then gave up.

r8edhardknock03:

i dont fink so [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2009, 09:27:40 pm[/size][hr]where do i type that in?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2009, 09:32:33 pm[/size][hr]?

Just do what I said here -

[quote=“jc22493, post:2, topic:262209”]Search this -

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

You should see this -

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl;
Make it this -

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 200; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl;[/quote]
